Articles.Content:
[Planet M.U.L.E.](http://www.planetmule.com/about/)

This is a remake of a classic.

The colony on Irata needs kerbals.

Just don't pick the [ripe puffball mushrooms](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puffballs).

[Multiple Use Labor Element](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M.U.L.E.)

![Mule_box.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/e/e0/Mule_box.jpg)

This had to be designed with a kerbal who invested in Artificial Dumbness.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T06:08:17Z" title="07/17/2015 06:08  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**

\*Watches Instructional Video\*

Wow. Space Capitalism. Two of my favorite things! Where do I sign up? I'm sold!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T19:06:11Z" title="07/17/2015 07:06  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by Flymetothemun**
